Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Best Irish bar in town; staff is super friendly, very cozy and welcoming

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Decent pint of guinness and good for the rugby. Get in early as pretty small. Only not a 5 due to the bar staff behave as they are doing you a favour with every drink served. To be fair though - it's part of the charm...

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Nice bar, Nice beers and nice staff....

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Female bartender missunderstood, what we said in a foreign language, we tried to explain, ended up getting an extra 30€ on the tab for nothing, She billed ordinary vodka as Grey Goose... So would not recommend.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Decent prices for the location. Do come early otherwise it will be full on weekend nights.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: A lovely Irish bar that is very quaint! It does tend to get busy so be sure to go up to the bar to order your drinks! There is also an upstairs loft area with seating that is rarely full as the downstairs seems to get full quite quickly. …

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Great  busy  but chilled irish bar great cocktails

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: I mean, if youre in an Irish bar in Amsterdam you've gone wrong somewhere. It's not like this is a bad bar exactly but it's a tourist bar nestled within a tourist nightmare. Visit a local brown bar or something. The Old Nickel is really nice.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Excellent bar in central Amsterdam near Paradiso !

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: 🇮🇪🇮🇪🇮🇪🇮🇪 Dan's is a very welcoming and friendly pub, there's a great selection of drinks on offer from the bar, it's in a prime location and am pretty sure it would be the ideal spot on a warm summer's day or night for a cool drink and watch the world go by, sláinte

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: They have Murphy's beer and great music, what else is needed?

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text:
Quality Guinness
Chill atmosphere
Friendly staff

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Awesome pub, I recommend drinking a Murphy's red pint!

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Good place, just round from the Melkweg.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: I don't usually go to Irish bars when I'm on holiday, but we were in Amsterdam and said why not 😂 There's a very nice fella from Louth behind the bar and they definitely make one of the nicest white russians I've had in ages 👍🍻 Highly recommended! 👌

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: This is really the go to bar for me and my mates when we are out for a drink near Leidseplein in Amsterdam and we need a bar with a relaxt atmosphere. It is never too busy and we always enjoy our stay there. Especially when the barkeeper …

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Apart from being at a perfect spot, the pub has knowledgeable and friendly staff. A good place to start an evening in Amsterdam, to make an intermediate stop or spend the evening with a lot of your friends...

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Cute little pub on the corner. They need to train their staff though. Went there in the summer, the waitress spilled drinks all over us (not her fault she tripped) and still charged us full price PLUS an additional 50 cents for using a debit card. Of all the places I've been thus far, drinks are on the house in this scenario.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Nice authentic irish pub. Tap Guinness and authentic Irish music. Beer from 3.30€ for half pint and 6.50€ for a pint. Not a bad place to stop while shopping around the area

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Nice little irish pub in the middle of Amsterdam. Really was like being back at home for the night . Had great crack here. Drink was very tasty...... what more you you ask for ?

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Nice little pub. Has seating inside up to the open access to the outdoor seating making for a best of both world experience in Summer. Friendly staff and good assortment beverages.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: It's a great bar to meet people. The barbmaids are hard work but love banter. Of you are in Amsterdam and want to meet some folks living there and find out what it's like then you would t be disappointed

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Great pub to hang out with mates 🍻🍻🍻

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Yeah, nice beer, nice bar. Thank you 🍻🍺

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Narsisistic manager. He refused to open a tab for us after visiting 2 years... We always had an open tab, till that day and his attitude was horrible. No pub on earth should feel that way their customers. Find another irish pub.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: One of my favorite bars in Amsterdam. Right on the Leidseplein gives you a front row seats to where the action happens. Its right in the centre, tram stop nearby, shops for everything in the street around the corner. Before you start your …

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Lovely place! Normally use for a pit stop before Melkweg. Really lovely staff who cannot do more for you & a great atmosphere

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Okayish Irish pub, not to much going on on Fridays an Saturdays. But you can have a nice conversation here over some pints.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Nice place, nice staff, good locals hanging around as well. Quiet in the mornings except when there is anything sporty on TV...... Couldn't give 5 stars only because of the price of beer....

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Reasonable Irish bar, guiness can be a hit and miss and no hot food served. Location is great if you enjoy the vibe of Leidseplein.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: nice amstel  reasanably priced for centre

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: A normal Irish in an another part of the world

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Great spot! Karaoke a blast. Head upstairs for extra seating and a bit of relief from the crowd. Bartenders are refreshingly friendly!

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Was my first visit and definitely won't be my last! Beer and drink prices were reasonable.  Staff was very friendly and helpful! 😁🍻

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Fantastic food, way bigger inside than it looks, great staff, great range and very comfortable. I hate the fact that if we only found this place the last day of our trip.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Ok wee pub in Amsterdam. The beers on draught are great, and of course there is Guinness. Outdoor seating is great and the location is perfect.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Great place for watching sports games or meeting up in the center of the city. Serves Irish beers and stouts and the staff is friendly and a lot are from Ireland.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Lovely little irish pub very refreshing drinks and go atmosphere

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Great atmosphere for a night out and really friendly staff who just want to help, good selection of drinks too

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Lovely Irish bar with irish staff. Good pint and good background music nice place to relax afte a day seeing the sights.. Up Tipp.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Great spot. Full of personality and craic. Shows all main Irish and European sports events. Highly recommend it.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Nice spot. Small pub but has a huge terrace out the front. Good drinks and service out on the terrace.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Great pub.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: No better Irish Bar in town! Service is second to none! Murphey's stout on draft, what more you'd you possibly wish for?!

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Service was incredibly slow. They don't have anything special on the menu. But it's nice that they have seats on leidseplein close to the buzz of the city

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: 9 euros 30 for a large Heineken and a small glass of flat coke? Really?

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: I love the old style sitting upstairs. Some nice Irish beers on the tap

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Ok friendly atmosphere drinks are good and sat outside watching the world go by.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Great place, whenever I am meeting the guys in Leideseplein, we always meet here. You could say it's my local that's not local !!! Hahahaha

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: They have matches at the bar, which sparked a conversation about the opportunity to have lighters. That make our evening. Explosive. Exactly

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Nice spot to enjoy a variety of beers. Music is at a decent level that you can enjoy, and still have a conversation

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Nice beer, fair price, kindly service but a very small choice of snacks or finger foods.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Great craic and lovely staff. Good selection beers and spirits.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Really cozy bar with some great staff and good craic. One of my favourite locals in town.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Great little pub and the bar staff are top notch .

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Best place to watch live Irish sports. Great staff, service and drinks.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: I like place and atmosphere over there. Really nice bartenders :)

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Depends what you're looking for.  Small inside seating large outside.  Real cozy Irish pub.  No food.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Great bar great price nice staff outdoor sitting area with heaters a shelter great area

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Terrible manager. Got a nice one from him, after going there for almost 2 years, every week, for asking him to open a tab.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Solid wee boozer and like any Irish pub makes striking up a conversation with a stranger a lot easier

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Excellent atmosphere, friendly staff, great selection of beers

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Proprietor has excellent taste in football. Wonderful bar.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Atmospheric Irish pub (Guinness on tap) in one of the nicest city squares in Amsterdam (liedseplien).

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Always fun, mainly a great location to go before catching a show in de Melkweg

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Nice Irish pub experience in the heart of Amsterdam! Great atmosphere and reasonable prices.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Very friendly staff. Great atmosphere. A little piece of the old sod in Amsterdam 😊

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: The best Irish Pub, serving  the best Irish Coffee in town.

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text:
Expensive, but that is only to be expected at Leidseplein.

I think it was €7.60 for a pint of guinness, but it was good guinness so I didn't mind that much

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Great bar great staff even showed an english match whilst ajax were playing

Name: Dan Murphy's Irish bar
Review Text: Great place, friendly staff good beer
